page.title: 19LANGAR IN THE WAR
page.content: Very few people went to war from Langar because many were farm workers, some were cement makers and others worked with the aircraft.All were reserved jobs. Langar Airfield was first used by the{R.A.F.}who flew{Lancaster {bombers}which were counted out and in every raid.They made very dark silhouettes in the sky.Later the {Americans}took over and used the airfield for practising gliding and parachuting .They seem to have wrecked all the gates in the village with their jeeps.They were followed by the {Canadians}who used the hangars for aircraft repairs,before the arrival of the German prisoners of war.Some people in Langar still have contact with their prisoners who helped on the land.
